highlights.title: End-to-End Type Safety Magic
highlights.problem: In traditional REST APIs, when you change a field on the backend, the frontend doesn't know about it until runtime errors appear.
highlights.solution: Using tRPC for automatic type synchronization between frontend and backend without code generation.
highlights.impact: Zero runtime type errors, instant refactoring across stack, autocomplete everywhere.

highlights.title: Kanban Drag & Drop with Clickable Buttons
highlights.problem: Standard drag & drop blocks ALL clicks during drag. Can't click Delete button inside a draggable card.
highlights.solution: Custom sensor that detects data-no-dnd attribute to allow interactive elements within draggable cards.
highlights.impact: Users can drag cards smoothly AND click buttons inside them. Best of both worlds!

highlights.title: Optimistic Updates with Rollback
highlights.problem: User clicks 'Mark as Done' → waits 500ms for API → finally sees change. Feels slow.
highlights.solution: Update UI instantly (optimistic), sync with backend in background, auto-rollback on errors.
highlights.impact: App feels instant. No waiting for API. Auto-rollback on errors.

highlights.title: Smart Debouncing for Search
highlights.problem: User types 'implement authentication' in search → 23 characters = 23 API requests in 2 seconds!
highlights.solution: Custom debounce hook that waits 300ms after user stops typing before querying.
highlights.impact: 23 requests → 1 request. Much happier API server!

highlights.title: Performance Optimization Masterclass
highlights.problem: List of 50 task cards re-renders completely on every parent state change, even if tasks didn't change.
highlights.solution: Strategic use of useMemo, useCallback, and React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders.
highlights.impact: 73% faster renders! From 450ms to 120ms for 50 tasks.
